# Darwhin Gomez

**Location:** New York, NY

**Phone:** 347-491-2955  
**LinkedIn:** [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)

---

## Summary  
Solutions-focused technologist with experience designing AWS architectures, automated data pipelines, and agentic AI tooling that shortens feedback loops and accelerates application throughput.

---

## Core Skills

- AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB)

- ETL/ELT (Glue, SSIS)  
- Generative AI (LLMs, fine-tuning)  
- Data Visualization (QuickSight, Power BI)  
- Security (SIEM, Active Directory)  
- Automation & CI/CD  
- Microservices Architecture  
- Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)  

---

- Designed secure AWS architectures for enterprise customers, enhancing reliability and compliance.

- Fine-tuned models in SageMaker, improving accuracy by 5% and reducing toxicity by 8%.

- Supported secure access for VIP users, enhancing organizational security posture.

- Developed testing materials and resources to assess student progress effectively.
